abstract: Spotify, the popular British music service, has made its first deal in the United States.
snippet: Spotify, the popular British music service, has made its first deal in the United States.
lead_paragraph: In what could be a breakthrough for the next phase of digital music, Sony Music Entertainment has signed a deal with Spotify, a sleek British online service, for distribution in the United States. Spotify, which streams music and has a smartphone app, has been a hit in Europe but its move across the Atlantic has been long delayed. Sony is the first major label group to sign for American distribution.

headline.main: Music Service Spotify Closes Deal With Sony
